original_title: Mother, May I Dance with Mary Jane's Fist?: A Lifetone Original Movie
overview: In this homage to the melodramatic made-for-TV-movie genre, aspiring ballerina Mary Jane Stevens moves to a new town with her emotionally abusive mother in hopes of escaping her physically abusive father. Originally a play performed at the Upright Citizens Brigade theatre, the Adult Swim production was executive produced by Tim Heidecker and Eric Wareheim.
title: Mother, May I Dance with Mary Jane's Fist?: A Lifetone Original Movie
